context_bundle.summary: Bidirectional AHK direct injection messaging between DC and KALIC agents. Bypasses file queues for real-time clipboard-paste-enter delivery.

onboarding.quick_start: DC->KALIC: X:\AHK  SCRIPTS\send_to_kalic.ahk. KALIC->DC: X:\AHK  SCRIPTS\kalic_to_dc.ahk. Both use CoordMode('Mouse','Screen'), target window by exe, paste via clipboard.
common_patterns: Safe send: C:\PhiDEX\scripts\safe_send_kalic.ps1 -Message 'text' (waits for AHK clear)
CoordMode fix: Must use CoordMode('Mouse','Screen') for correct click coordinates
known_errors: Lowercase claude.exe in ahk_exe (Window Spy shows lowercase)
Click 100px from bottom not 50px for input field
Missing CoordMode causes wrong click position
AHK stacking: multiple instances queue and scroll wildly
